    Exceptions and Description
    nl.helixsoft.recordstream.RecordStreamException
    use more generic StreamException instead
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    nl.helixsoft.util.FileUtils.addBeforeExtension(String, String)
    use HFileUtils.
    nl.helixsoft.stats.DefaultDataFrame.createWithHeader(String...)
    use DataFrameOperation.createWithHeader instead
    nl.helixsoft.util.StringUtils.emptyOrNull(String)
    nl.helixsoft.util.StringUtils.escapeHtml(String)
    nl.helixsoft.util.FileUtils.expandGlob(String)
    use HFileUtils.
    nl.helixsoft.util.FileUtils.expandGlob(String, File)
    use HFileUtils.
    nl.helixsoft.util.FileUtils.getApplicationDir()
    use HFileUtils.
    nl.helixsoft.stats.DataFrame.getColumnName(int)
    nl.helixsoft.stats.DataFrame.getColumnNames()
    nl.helixsoft.graph.Edge.getDest()
    nl.helixsoft.util.FileUtils.getFiles(File, boolean)
    use HFileUtils.getFiles
    nl.helixsoft.util.FileUtils.getFiles(File, String, boolean)
    use HFileUtils.getFiles
    nl.helixsoft.stats.DataFrame.getMetaData()
    nl.helixsoft.graph.Edge.getSrc()
    nl.helixsoft.util.TempFile.getStream()

    nl.helixsoft.recordstream.DefaultRecord.getValue(String)
    nl.helixsoft.util.StringUtils.join(StringBuilder, String, Collection)
    nl.helixsoft.util.StringUtils.join(StringBuilder, String, T...)
    nl.helixsoft.util.StringUtils.join(String, Collection)
    nl.helixsoft.util.StringUtils.join(String, T...)
    nl.helixsoft.util.FileUtils.makeApplicationDir(String)
    use HFileUtils.
    nl.helixsoft.stats.DataFrameOperation.merge(DataFrame, DataFrame, int, int)
    use merge (a, b).onColumns(onThisColumn, onThatColumn).fullJoin().get()
    nl.helixsoft.stats.DataFrameOperation.merge(DataFrame, DataFrame, String)
    use merge (a, b).onColumn(onColumn).fullJoin().get()
    nl.helixsoft.stats.DataFrameOperation.merge(DataFrame, DataFrame, String, DataFrameOperation.JoinType)
    use merge (a, b).onColumn(onColumn).joinType().get()
    nl.helixsoft.stats.DataFrameOperation.merge(DataFrame, DataFrame, String, String, DataFrameOperation.JoinType)
    use merge (a, b).onColumns(onThisColumn, onThatColumn).joinType().get()
    nl.helixsoft.stats.DataFrame.merge(DataFrame, int, int)
    : use DataFrameOperation instead
    nl.helixsoft.stats.DataFrame.merge(DataFrame, String)
    : use DataFrameOperation instead
    nl.helixsoft.util.FileUtils.openZipStream(File)
    use HFileUtils.openZipStream
    nl.helixsoft.util.StringUtils.permissiveQuotedCommaSplit(String)
    nl.helixsoft.util.StringUtils.quotedCommaSplit(String)
    nl.helixsoft.util.FileUtils.safeMachineName()
    use HFileUtils.
    nl.helixsoft.util.FileUtils.safeMachineName(String)
    use HFileUtils.
    nl.helixsoft.util.StringUtils.safeParseDouble(String)
    use HStringUtils.safeParseDouble
    nl.helixsoft.util.StringUtils.safeParseInt(String)
    use HStringUtils.safeParseInt
    nl.helixsoft.recordstream.TabularIO.write(DataFrame, OutputStream)
    use write(df).to(os).go()
    nl.helixsoft.recordstream.TabularIO.write(RecordStream, OutputStream)
    use write(rs).to(os).go()
